summary:
**The Amazing Spider-Man (2012)**

This superhero movie is about Peter Parker, a high school student who gets spider powers after a bite from a special spider. He becomes Spider-Man, fighting crime, but also faces personal struggles. The film is a reboot of the Spider-Man series, starring Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, and Rhys Ifans. It was well-received and made lots of money. A sequel followed, and Garfield later appeared in another Spider-Man movie, connecting different Spider-Man stories.
title: The Amazing Spider-Man (film)
